text:
B.SAGURULLA
Mobile: +971-56-6434813 ~ E-Mail: sagurulla@hotmail.com
Sr. Engineer – Contracts & Procurement
CAREER OVERVIEW
Currently Working as Senior Contracts & Procurement Engineer with over 8 years of experience in Procurement of
Equipments for Power Sectors, Utilities and Oil & Gas Projects with EPC Firm.
Experience in Procurement of different types of Electrical Equipments, mechanical equipments and bulk materials as
per project requirement from various Manufacturers based in Europe and USA.
Responsible for Sending RFQ, Tender Bulletins to bidders, Technical Clarifications, Conduct Clarification Meetings,
negotiate with vendors, Prepare Purchase Order or Contracts and to release on Successful bidder by conducting E-
Auctions.
Responsible for obtaining PO Acknowledgement after release of PO. Monitoring of Purchase Orders / Contracts with
Sub-contractors’ / Vendors post award and to monitor Warranty of the Equipments/Services till the Warranty Period
and Close out.
Responsible for initiation of Change Orders, monitoring the Change Requests and realizing the variation with direct
liaison with Client.
An effective leader with distinguished abilities in leading & motivating a workforce for accomplishing project targets in
the given timeframe.
OTHER KEY SKILLS
Supply Chain Management Project Management Techno Commercial Negotiations 
KNOWLEDGE PURVIEW
Managing procurement activities till project close out and tracking Supplier Performance during the course of the 
Project. 
Preparation of Budget, Cash flow, Finance requirements and arranging Insurance for the projects.
Conversant in General Accounting Principles, Mode of Payments & Currency Hedging.
Possess knowledge in developing contracts/Purchase Order complying to Client’s requirement and Organization’s 
Quality requirements.
Possess Experience in interacting with Various Manufacturer’s / Supplier’s across Europe and with various Clients.
Proficient in English and to work in a multicultural environment across different time zones.
CAREER RECITAL
Growth Path
(4) Emirates Technical Associates- Power Projects Division, Abu Dhabi
Feb’2015- Till date Sr. Engineer – Contracts, Procurement & Expedition
Project:GASCO Project 5283: Engineering, Procurement & Construction Phase – 
Power Generation Units Retirement Project @ ASAB, BU HASA, HABSHAN & BAB 
(Abu Dhabi oil fields)
Platform :Engineering, Procurement and Construction Phase of Primary Substations at ASAB, BAB, 
HABSHAN& BUHASA for GASCO.
Client:GASCO
Consultant:Mott MacDonald
Value:USD.194 Million
Project Deliverables:Study of Front End Engineering Design (FEED) Documents and Summarize the Procurement & Services Deliverables
of the Projects. Identifying Long Lead items and to prepare procurement plan to kick start the Procurement Activities.
Responsible for Preparing and Monitoring of the Budget.
Responsible for Sending out RFQ (Request for Quotation), Evaluate offers, analyzing the data and issuing award
recommendation for Placement of PO.
Negotiating with Vendors for better Payment Terms, Warranty and After Sales Services for the Supplied Products.
Responsible  for  Preparation  of  Purchase  Order  considering  Company  Policies,  Client’s  Requirement’s  &  Local
Government Regulations and obtaining Purchase Order Acknowledgement from vendors.
Monitoring of the Purchase Order and to obtain delivery confirmation from vendor and ensuring the materials and
equipments are arriving on time based on the Project requirement.
Responsible for reducing cost in procurement of bulk materials by identifying alternate vendors without compromising
on Quality and Delivery requirements of the Project.
Responsible for Raising CTN (Contract Trend Notice) and Submitting it. 
Supporting/coordinating Logistic Operations based on the Delivery terms of the PO.
Responsible for reviewing Letter of credit.
Attending  Weekly  review  meetings  with  Client/Consultant  to  update  the  Procurement,  Sub-Contracting  and
Manufacturing Status of the Project. 
Responsible for Reporting Budget vs Actual of the Procurement Budget on Monthly basis.
Ensuring documentation as per Quality & HSE Management System of the Organization.
Ensuring to execute all the processes in accordance with organizational policy requirements.
